news.title: Pro-Israel organisation urges Canadian government to deny KNEECAP and Bob Vylan entry to the country
news.summary: The organisation claimed KNEECAP's and Bob Vylan's Glastonbury performances went against their "core values."

news.title: Medium Build at the Sugar Club (Photos)
Remembering Lord Henry Mount Charles: "A real pioneering figure in Irish music"
news.summary: Lord Henry Mount Charles put Slane Castle on the rock ‘n’ roll map during the 1980s. He brought Thin Lizzy to the banks of the Boyne on numerous occasions.
